thread.title: Caribtours offers 30% discount for solo BodyHolidays
thread.title_full: Caribtours offers 30% discount for solo BodyHolidays

title: Caribtours offers 30% discount for solo BodyHolidays
text:
Caribtours offers 30% discount for solo BodyHolidays 13 July 2015 Save 
Caribtours has teamed up with The BodyHoliday Le Sport to offer a 30% discount for single travellers this September. 
The all-inclusive St Lucian resort runs September Solos, which sees much of the month given over to the needs of single travellers while cocktail parties and sunset cruises are part of the deal. 
Following the deal, the operator is now offering seven nights at the hotel with prices leading in at Â£1,825 from August 30 to September 27. 
Flights are included in the price, as is a daily hour-long spa treatment for guests once they are in resort.
